basics.label: Sr. Finance Manager
basics.summary: Finance professional with a successful track record of driving the financial planning cycle and transforming strategic goals into operational plans. Demonstrated ability to build strong financial models, improve processes and drive business results. Self-starter and creative problem solver. Passionate about building a collaborative environment and empowering people.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Served as Global FP&A lead to VP of Finance in all planning related questions and communication with Corp FP&A. Led the Annual Global Field Quota plan setting process ($6B) including product hierarchy update, definition and communication. The hiring and on-boarding process of two reports in headquarters and three individuals on other teams in Bulgaria.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Developed an Expense Planning model for Customer Operations budget allocation of $2B. Created and established a standard Financial dashboard. Created and established a standard weekly Headcount dashboard for Customer Operations.
